name: ApsimRegions
tagline: ApsimRegions is a one-way nested climate-crop modeling framework that links gridded weather data (rain, temperature, radiation, etc.) with the point-specific Agricultural Production Systems sIMulator (APSIM) crop model.
body:
### Welcome to ApsimRegions.
Here you can find the code from the links above and the documentation.

### Authors and Contributors
ApsimRegions was created by David Stack (@dhstack) while at Chapman University's Center of Excellence in Earth Systems Modeling & Observations ([CEESMO](http://www.chapman.edu/scst/centers-of-excellence/earth-observing/index.aspx)) and funded by the US Department of Agriculture's National Institute of Food and Agriculture ([NIFA](http://www.csrees.usda.gov/)).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with ApsimRegions? Check out the documentation first, and if you still have trouble, contact David directly and heâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
